cu.explanation_en: Setting the remote S address to an unreachable IP (10.0.0.1) will cause connectivity failures between CU and DU.

du.explanation_en: Setting remote N address to the same as local N address creates IP conflicts, preventing proper network communication.
du.explanation_zh: 將遠端 N 地址設定為與本地 N 地址相同會建立 IP 衝突，阻止正確的網路通訊。
